thread.title: Adele Reveals Artwork and Release Date for New Album '25'
thread.title_full: Adele Reveals Artwork and Release Date for New Album '25'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Adele Reveals Artwork and Release Date for New Album '25'
text:
Comments The 'Skyfall' singer lets her online fans know that she is scheduled to release her next studio installment next month. 
Adele gives another exciting update on her long-awaited studio album. After revealing the title " 25 ", the 27-year-old Grammy winner announces the release date and the artwork. The mother of one is set to roll out the CD on November 20. The "Someone Like You" crooner posted the info on her social media platforms like Twitter and Facebook. "I'm so bloody excited!!" she tweeted. On top of that, she has also joined Instagram . She has quickly racked up over 25,000 followers and still counting. A photo posted by @adele on Oct 22, 2015 at 6:55am PDT Adele described her new album as " a make-up record ." She explained, "I'm making up with myself. Making up for lost time. Making up for everything I ever did and never did." She apologized to fans for the long wait, "I'm so sorry it took so long, but you know, life happened." The tracklist for the album has also been unveiled: "Hello" "Send My Love (To Your New Lover)" "I Miss You"
